title: How to get galactic renekton?
body: I don't know how to get this skin right now, but just sometime ago i saw a price on it, so, can i still get it someway?

replies.body:
Step 1: Take Renekton into space
Step 2: Nobody has survived Step 1 so far.
Nobody has survived taking Renekton *anywhere*. He does not travel well.
Fun Fact: The phrase, "See you later alligator" was coined because no one likes to car pool with Renekton.

> [{quoted}](name=Kouga,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=huRAuFek,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-13T20:55:04.656+0000)
>
> Fun Fact: The phrase, "See you later alligator" was coined because no one likes to car pool with Renekton.

[*Paging Renekton Bot.*](https://twitter.com/CupcakeTrap/status/587793336963993600)

Galactic Renekton is a legacy skin, which means it's currently locked up in the Legacy Vault. We take skins out of the Legacy Vault periodically throughout the year, and there's a chance this skin will be one of them! Keep an eye out!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=huRAuFek,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-13T20:38:30.226+0000)
>
> Galactic Renekton is a legacy skin, which means it's currently locked up in the Legacy Vault. We take skins out of the Legacy Vault periodically throughout the year, and there's a chance this skin will be one of them! Keep an eye out!

thanks {{champion:58}} A LOT
